helpers: Adds or subtracts a constant value from the raw reading, this shifts the value a constant amount
Multiply the raw reading by a constant, this affects the slope of the response
The Multiplier2 affects the curve of the correction
If the change in a raw value between consecutive readings is greater than the spike value it will be ignored
If the raw value exceeds a limit value it will be ignored

log.rightLabel: Log spike and limit violations to error log
